messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] 40 is Magic!  Special Birthday Offer
messages.msgSnippet: great!  i ll be 41 on 22 august so now i have even more reason to buy more books thanks. susan austin, tx ... 40. ... at ... availability) ... be
messages.messageBody:
great! i'll be 41 on 22 august so now i have even more reason to buy
more books

thanks.
susan
austin, tx

>
> FUN Books is pleased (well, maybe not all that pleased) to announce
> that on August 11, 2000, Nancy will be 40 and on August 26, 2000,
> Billy will be 41. This means that for a few weeks we will both be
40.
>
> We'd like to invite you to celebrate with us and we even have a gift
> for you. Place an order between Aug. 11 and Aug. 26 and if you buy
at
> least one item at our regular discounted price, you can take 40% off
> the current full retail price of another item of equal or lesser
> value. To receive this discount, just indicate the item you want to
> have discounted (remember, you must purchase at least one other item
> of equal or higher value) and write "Happy Birthday, Billy and
> Nancy!" on your order. Your order will also ensure that you get a
> copy of our brand new catalog.
>
> You have 4 ways to order:
>
> By mail: FUN Books, 1688 Bellhaven Woods Ct, Pasadena MD 21122-3727
> By Phone (fax or voice mail): 888 FUN-7020 (888 386-7020) or in
> Maryland 410 360-7330
> By e-mail: orders@...
> on-line: http://www.FUN-Books.com (limited shopping cart
availability)
>
> (The fine print: This offer cannot be combined with any other offer
> and only one discount can be used per household. The discount will
be
> 40% off the current FULL RETAIL price of the item, not off our
> already discounted price. In our catalog, the retail price is
> indicated with a line through it. Please note that publishers change
> prices frequently and our catalog may not reflect the current retail
> price. Please be sure to include your e-mail address or phone number
> so we can contact you before processing your order if any items have
> increased in price.)
>
> Please feel free to share this special offer with all your friends!
